column1: My friends and I took the Las Marietas tour and had a great time! Unfortunately the island we were to visit was not available for us to stop at due to an abunda...
Great view when the sun is setting, but the food wasn't t die for. I had the chicken salad and it was pretty basic.
I loved the island itself. There were hammocks and lounge chairs everywhere. The views were fantastic! They had yoga classes, salsa making and mescal tasting a...
